dbdao.core

Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbdao.core.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    This class is made translate java objects to a specific tables in the database and back. No business activity records here

      This method deletes all the company records in the company table.

        public void removeCompany(Company company)
